00148 int nfs_Symlink( nfs_arg_t               * parg    /* IN  */,
00149                  exportlist_t            * pexport /* IN  */,
00150                  fsal_op_context_t             * pcontext   /* IN  */,
00151                  cache_inode_client_t    * pclient /* IN  */,
00152                  hash_table_t            * ht      /* INOUT */,
00153                  struct svc_req          * preq    /* IN  */,
00154                  nfs_res_t               * pres    /* OUT */ ) 
00155 {
00156         static char     funcName[] = "nfs_Symlink";
00157 
00158         char                  * str_symlink_name = NULL;
00159   fsal_name_t             symlink_name         ;
00160         char                  * str_target_path = NULL;
00161   cache_inode_create_arg_t  create_arg;
00162         fsal_accessmode_t       mode = 0777        ;
00163         cache_entry_t         * symlink_pentry     ;
00164   cache_entry_t         * parent_pentry        ;
00165   cache_inode_file_type_t parent_filetype      ;
00166   fsal_attrib_list_t      parent_attr          ;
00167   fsal_attrib_list_t      attr                 ;
00168   fsal_attrib_list_t      attr_symlink         ;
00169   fsal_attrib_list_t      attr_parent_after    ;
00170   fsal_attrib_list_t    * ppre_attr            ;
00171   int                     rc                   ;
00172   cache_inode_status_t    cache_status         ;
00173   cache_inode_status_t    cache_status_parent  ;
00174   fsal_handle_t         * pfsal_handle         ;
00175 
00176         if (preq->rq_vers == NFS_V3)
00177         {
00178                 /* to avoid setting it on each error case */
00179                 pres->res_symlink3.SYMLINK3res_u.resfail.dir_wcc.before.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00180                 pres->res_symlink3.SYMLINK3res_u.resfail.dir_wcc.after.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00181                 ppre_attr = NULL;
00182         }
00183         
00184   /* Convert directory file handle into a vnode */
00185   if( ( parent_pentry = nfs_FhandleToCache( preq->rq_vers,
00186                                             &(parg->arg_symlink2.from.dir),
00187                                              &(parg->arg_symlink3.where.dir),
00188                                             NULL, 
00189                                             &(pres->res_stat2),
00190                                             &(pres->res_symlink3.status),
00191                                             NULL,
00192                                             &parent_attr, 
00193                                             pcontext, 
00194                                             pclient, 
00195                                             ht, 
00196                                             &rc ) ) == NULL )
00197     {
00198       /* Stale NFS FH ? */
00199       return rc ;
00200     }                                            
00201 
00202   /* get directory attributes before action (for V3 reply) */
00203   ppre_attr = &parent_attr;
00204   
00205   /* Extract the filetype */
00206   parent_filetype = cache_inode_fsal_type_convert( parent_attr.type ) ;
00207   
00208   
00209         /*
00210          * Sanity checks: new directory name must be non-null; parent must be
00211          * a directory. 
00212          */
00213         if( parent_filetype != DIR_BEGINNING && parent_filetype != DIR_CONTINUE )
00214     {
00215       switch( preq->rq_vers )
00216         {
00217         case NFS_V2:
00218           pres->res_stat2 = NFSERR_NOTDIR ;
00219           break;
00220           
00221         case NFS_V3:
00222           pres->res_symlink3.status = NFS3ERR_NOTDIR ;
00223           break;
00224         }
00225       
00226       return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00227     }
00228   
00229         switch( preq->rq_vers )
00230     {
00231     case NFS_V2:
00232       str_symlink_name = parg->arg_symlink2.from.name;
00233       str_target_path = parg->arg_symlink2.to;
00234       break;
00235       
00236     case NFS_V3:
00237       str_symlink_name = parg->arg_symlink3.where.name;
00238       str_target_path = parg->arg_symlink3.symlink.symlink_data;
00239       break; 
00240     }
00241   
00242         symlink_pentry = NULL;
00243   
00244         if( str_symlink_name == NULL                                                             || 
00245       strlen( str_symlink_name ) == 0                                                      ||
00246             str_target_path == NULL                                                              || 
00247       strlen( str_target_path ) == 0                                                       ||
00248       FSAL_IS_ERROR( FSAL_str2name( str_symlink_name, FSAL_MAX_NAME_LEN, &symlink_name ) ) ||
00249       FSAL_IS_ERROR( FSAL_str2path( str_target_path, FSAL_MAX_PATH_LEN, &create_arg.link_content ) ) )
00250     {
00251       cache_status = CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00252     } 
00253   else
00254     {
00255       /* Make the symlink */
00256       if( ( symlink_pentry = cache_inode_create( parent_pentry,
00257                                                  &symlink_name, 
00258                                                  SYMBOLIC_LINK, 
00259                                                  mode, 
00260                                                  &create_arg, 
00261                                                  &attr_symlink, 
00262                                                  ht,
00263                                                  pclient, 
00264                                                  pcontext, 
00265                                                  &cache_status ) ) != NULL )      
00266         {
00267           switch( preq->rq_vers )
00268             {
00269             case NFS_V2:
00270               pres->res_stat2 = NFS_OK;
00271               break;
00272               
00273             case NFS_V3:
00274               /* Build file handle */
00275               if( ( pfsal_handle =  cache_inode_get_fsal_handle( symlink_pentry,
00276                                                                  &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00277                 {
00278                   pres->res_symlink3.status = NFS3ERR_IO ; 
00279                   return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00280                 }
00281                
00282               if( ( pres->res_symlink3.SYMLINK3res_u.resok.obj.post_op_fh3_u.handle.data.data_val = Mem_Alloc( NFS3_FHSIZE ) ) == NULL )
00283                 {
00284                   pres->res_symlink3.status = NFS3ERR_IO ; 
00285                   return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00286                 }
00287 
00288               if( nfs3_FSALToFhandle( &pres->res_symlink3.SYMLINK3res_u.resok.obj.post_op_fh3_u.handle,
00289                                       pfsal_handle,
00290                                       pexport ) == 0 )
00291                 {
00292                   Mem_Free( (char *)pres->res_symlink3.SYMLINK3res_u.resok.obj.post_op_fh3_u.handle.data.data_val ) ;
00293 
00294                   pres->res_symlink3.status = NFS3ERR_BADHANDLE ;
00295                   return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00296                 }
00297 
00298               /* The the parent pentry attributes for building Wcc Data */
00299               if( cache_inode_getattr( parent_pentry, 
00300                                        &attr_parent_after, 
00301                                        ht, 
00302                                        pclient, 
00303                                        pcontext, 
00304                                        &cache_status_parent )  != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00305                 {
00306                    Mem_Free( (char *)pres->res_symlink3.SYMLINK3res_u.resok.obj.post_op_fh3_u.handle.data.data_val ) ;
00307 
00308                    pres->res_symlink3.status = NFS3ERR_BADHANDLE ;
00309                    return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00310                 }
00311               
00312                   
00313               /* Set Post Op Fh3 structure */
00314               pres->res_symlink3.SYMLINK3res_u.resok.obj.handle_follows = TRUE ;
00315               pres->res_symlink3.SYMLINK3res_u.resok.obj.post_op_fh3_u.handle.data.data_len = sizeof( file_handle_v3_t ) ;
00316 
00317         
00318               /* Build entry attributes */
00319               nfs_SetPostOpAttr( pcontext, pexport,
00320                                  symlink_pentry, 
00321                                  &attr_symlink,
00322                                  &(pres->res_symlink3.SYMLINK3res_u.resok.obj_attributes) );
00323               
00324               /* Build Weak Cache Coherency data */
00325               nfs_SetWccData (pcontext, pexport,
00326                               parent_pentry, 
00327                               ppre_attr,
00328                               &attr_parent_after,
00329                               &(pres->res_symlink3.SYMLINK3res_u.resok.dir_wcc) );
00330               
00331               pres->res_symlink3.status = NFS3_OK;
00332               break;
00333             } /* switch */
00334           
00335           return NFS_REQ_OK; 
00336         }
00337     }
00338   
00339         /* If we are here, there was an error */
00340         if( nfs_RetryableError( cache_status ) )
00341     {
00342       return NFS_REQ_DROP ;
00343     }
00344         
00345   nfs_SetFailedStatus( pcontext, pexport,
00346                        preq->rq_vers, 
00347                        cache_status,
00348                        &pres->res_stat2,
00349                        &pres->res_symlink3.status,
00350                        NULL, NULL,
00351                        parent_pentry,
00352                        ppre_attr,
00353                        &(pres->res_symlink3.SYMLINK3res_u.resfail.dir_wcc),
00354                        NULL, NULL, NULL);
00355   
00356         return NFS_REQ_OK;
00357 } /* nfs_Symlink */
00358 
00359 
00368 void nfs_Symlink_Free( nfs_res_t * resp )
00369 {
00370   if ((resp->res_symlink3.status == NFS3_OK) &&
00371       (resp->res_symlink3.SYMLINK3res_u.resok.obj.handle_follows == TRUE))
00372     Mem_Free(resp->res_symlink3.SYMLINK3res_u.resok.obj.post_op_fh3_u.handle.data.data_val);
00373 } /* nfs_Symlink_Free */
